ctx: assert (H: exists k : nat, n = f k).
exceptions.exn: The reference Hk was not found in the current environment.

ctx: assert (H: exists k : nat, n = f k).
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) HP : forall n : nat, P n <-> (exists k : nat, n = f k) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y n : nat Unable to unify "f ?M1414 <= f ?M1415" with "P n".

original: assert (H: exists k : nat, n = f k). apply HP. destruct H as [k Hk]. rewrite Hk. apply f_mono.
